page.title: 13FAMILY LIFE IN THEALE
page.content: In our family my Dad gets up at 06:30, goes down stairs and has breakfast, then gets into his car and goes to work in London. At 07:00 my sister gets up, has breakfast, makes her sandwiches and feeds our animals. She gets her books ready for school and waits for friends to call for her and leaves for school at 08:10. My Mum gets up next. Finally I get up at 08:00, get my sandwiches and have my breakfast. Then I get ready for school and leave at 08:35. My Dad is a company secretary. My Mum is just a housewife but also does upholstery and china restoration. My sister and I come home from school at 15:30. My Dad finishes work at 18:00 and gets home at 19:30. My sister and I go to bed at 21:30 and my Mum and Dad go to bed at 23:00. GERALD WEST AGED 11 YEARS
